title: India : number of internet users 2015 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: This statistic provides information on the Number of internet in India from 2015 to 2023 .
In 2023 , it is expected that 666.4 millions of the population in India will be also accessing the social network , up from 483.0 millions in 2018 .
gold: In 2018 , India had 483 million internet users . This figure is projected to grow to 666.4 million internet users in 2023 . Despite the untapped potential , India already is the second-largest online market worldwide .
